12.author: RealCountryBoy
12.body: Okay, if you're asking then I'll tell you. I don't find him funny at all. I also find it pathetic that he and Hollywood tried as hard as he could to be the Cheech & Chong for millennials but that was a fail. He just looked like a lame clown. Next, I can't stand his stupid cookie monster voice and just how he looks in general. I'd rather stare at a dog turd then watch anything with him in it.

12.author: Alpha_The_Wolf534
12.body: So I guess that means your not watching the Mario movie then? Seeing how he’s playing DK.

12.author: RealCountryBoy
12.body: No, Honestly I try and avoid new movies. I live off the old stuff these days and many people I know do the same. I think Hollywood is a total loss. I don't wanna see them do to Mario what they just did to Scooby.

12.author: Alpha_The_Wolf534
12.body: Okay now I’m curious, what was the last modern movie you watched and when did you watch it?

12.author: RealCountryBoy
12.body: My wife recently talked me into watching some dumb movie and we regretted it. It was terrible. lol 'Pieces of a woman' or something. A Scorsese movie. Before that I couldn't tell you because it was so forgettable.

12.author: Alpha_The_Wolf534
12.body: Yeah, I just looked it up and that movie looks like shit. If your open to any modern movies that are actually good or somewhat decent, I recommend “The Batman” and “Elvis”. They are somewhat on the long side, but they were both fantastic IMO.

13.body: My international friends sometimes laugh when i say yall but like idk man its just how i talk

13.author: Captain_Hindenburg
13.body: Same. I used to sound like a dictionary until I just stopped caring about how I speak. Now I use y'aint because I've got some idiots for friends. Love em though.

13.author: confusedPIANO
13.body: Yeah i mean its just language bro, chill and vibe. I also end up using words that are more of african american vernacular english like tryna and finna which i sometimes get overly conscious about because im whiter than snow. But fuck it man imma talk how i wanna talk cause its easy and ppl understand

13.author: Captain_Hindenburg
13.body: Go for it, makes conversation flow so much better. I've been adopting a few small bits of Aussie slang because it just works. How the hell did I not know the word munted exists

13.author: confusedPIANO
13.body: Lol last week i got yelled at by my drunk aussie friend for saying makkers instead of makkahs and it was great
